messages.title: Reasons why you should support the re-election of Roberta in 2017.
messages.content:
Labour will:
- Provide a secure, publicly funded NHS
- Build 1 million new homes in five years, including new council homes
- Protect the value of pensions
- Raise the living wage to £10 per hour
- Provide a national/regional development bank to fund infrastructure
- Control immigration fairly and sensibly
- Jobs guarantee scheme for young people and reintroduce EMA

messages.title: Roberta is currently running campaigns to:
messages.content:
Protect our schools budget from an unfair Tory funding formula
- Get justice for 1950s-born WASPI women who have unfairly had their pensions reduced, and protect the value of all pensions.
- Build more affordable, good quality housing
- Defending our front line police service
- Secure a sustainable, properly funded future for our NHS and Social Care services
- Campaigning to protect Durham from overdevelopment
- Ensure young people can access the education and training they need

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will provide a secure, publicly funded National Health Service.
Labour will build 1 million new homes in five years, including new council homes. Roberta is campaigning to build more affordable, good quality housing and protect Durham from overdevelopment.
Labour will protect the value of pensions. Roberta is specifically focused on getting justice for 1950s-born WASPI women and protecting the value of all pensions.
Labour will raise the living wage to £10 per hour.
Roberta is campaigning to ensure young people can access the education and training they need. Labour will reintroduce EMA and provide a jobs guarantee scheme for young people.
Labour will control immigration fairly and sensibly.
Roberta is campaigning to defend our front line police service.

issues.education: Roberta is campaigning to ensure young people can access the education and training they need. Labour will reintroduce EMA.
